summary: This tweak delays/prevents the Dawnguard vampire attacks and quest start.
descriptionHtml:
This tweak delays/prevents the Dawnguard vampire attacks and quest start.
I prefer to start this content at a higher level, you can also just prevent the vampire attacks/quest start entirely.

[b]DawnguardDelayedStart999.esp[/b]
Effectively disables vampire attacks and the quest start (until level 999).
Use this version if you want to stop both indefinitely, or just until you feel ready!

[b]DawnguardDelayedStart20.esp[/b]
Vampire attacks start at level 19, Dawnguard Quest at 20.

[b]DawnguardDelayedStart30.esp[/b]
Vampire attacks start at level 29, Dawnguard Quest at 30.

[b]DawnguardDelayedStart40.esp[/b]
Vampire attacks start at level 39, Dawnguard Quest at 40.

[b]DawnguardDelayedStart50.esp[/b]
Vampire attacks start at level 49, Dawnguard Quest at 50.

Notes:
- Can be added to existing games to prevent further attacks.
- The Dawnguard quest can be started at any time by travelling to Fort Dawnguard.
- This will only prevent vampire city raids and traveler encounters, not other encouters.
- The changes are Constant Global Variables and will not be saved with save game data, removing the .esp will revert the values and attacks will then start (if appropriate level).
- Confirmed clean in TES5Edit.

Changelog:
v1.1 - Added tweak to prevent traveler encouters (Thanks WoodsDweller!)

-------
INSTALLATION:
1) Install via Nexus Mod Manager.
(Manual Install: Copy [b]one[/b] .esp to your Data folder.)
-------
UNINSTALLATION:
1) Uninstall via Nexus Mod Manager.
(Manual Install: Delete copied .esp from your Data folder.)
-------

Changed variables:

[b]DLC1VQMinLevel[/b]: As per selection above (Default 10)
Constant - Not saved with save game data.

[b]DLC1VQMinLevelVampireAttacks[/b]: As per selection above (Default 8)
Constant - Not saved with save game data.

[b]DLC1RadiantDisguisedVampireLordChance[/b]: 0 (default 25)
Changed to Constant - Not saved with save game data.
author: Okal

files.name: Dawnguard Delayed Start
files.changelogHtml: Added tweak to prevent traveler encouters.
